ComicInfo.Title: Ye Olde Shelle Game!
ComicInfo.Summary: Ye Olde Shelle Game!: Finding the fallen body of the Hela-cursed Thor, the Storm Giants pound him into putty. A strange malady falls over Asgard causing all to sleep. The Storm Giants are tricked into resurrecting the Destroyer. Thor is restored to fight the Destroyer, but ends up being absorbed into the unstoppable juggernaut's armor.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:37:24. [Issue ID 43114]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
